item.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come have Kaffee und Kuchen with us. Tonight we plan to have a few German Scrabble games available for those who would like to play. Ich bringe mein Worterbuch! Whether you are a native speaker, learned German in Germany or in college, high school or on your own, welcome! It's a great way to retain language skills that would otherwise get very rusty. Please come prepared to have a fun and interesting evening speaking German. Not everyone RSVP's so there are usually many more people than shown here. Bis dann!
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch January Meetup
